issue.title: [Release] Update release verification script to check binaries on Bintray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4257](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4257). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The release verification script still expects the binaries to be on the ASF dist server
